20110126190130.000|20110126190131.000|CC1|GARDENA AND BEYOND.             
20110126190131.000|20110126190132.000|CC1|DETECTIVES, D.E.A. AND POLICE   
20110126190132.000|20110126190136.000|CC1|SEARCHED 11 LOCATIONS IN        
20110126190136.000|20110126190138.000|CC1|GARDENA, COMPTON, LONG BEACH,   
20110126190138.000|20110126190140.000|CC1|EL MONTE HARBOR CITY AND

20110126190142.000|20110126190146.000|CC1|OF A YEAR LONG MURDER AND DRUG

20110126190148.000|20110126190149.000|CC1|IN THE GARDENA AREA.            
20110126190149.000|20110126190151.000|CC1|ALONG WITH THE ARRESTS, THEY

20110126190251.000|20110126190253.000|CC1|CATCH TWO MEN MONDAY.
